name: RhythmShooter
description:
Music & Rhythm Based Top-Down Survival,

you have to survive in space by destroying enemies and avoiding bullets, however ambiance depends on the MUSIC you choose.

You can select any MP3 or WMA file from your music collection to play.

Features:

  • Dynamic Gameplay!
  • Listen to your favorite music while playing the game!
  • Every game level is unique!
  • Unlock different difficulties!
  • Unlock new weapons!
  • Get more combo to increase weapon power!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Left Mouse Button - Primary Weapon
  • Right Mouse Button - Secondary Weapon ( bombs )
  • Alt + Enter - Toggle fullscreen

If you have any problems please contact:

  • ftpud12@gmail.com

Make sure you have installed:

  • .NET Framework 4.0
  • XNA 4.0 Redistributable

Some anti-virus software may cause game crashes.

If you are interested in the game, you can try DEMO version.

However, demo has some limitations, you can't unlock and change weapons,

and save your progress.
